This project is ...

- How to start
- Screenshots

# Features

- Secure admin interface based on [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/)
- Configure your Nginx without knowing anything
- Request SSL certificates with Let's Encrypt or provide your own custom SSL certificates
- API available for automatise nginx configuration deployment
- Configure your Health checks for your hosts
